articles.author: Jane Green
articles.title: I sold off a family heirloom - now my siblings are threatening to SUE ME - Daily Mail
articles.description: In this week's agony aunt column, best-selling author Jane Green offers some advice to a woman whose siblings 'flipped out' when she sold a family heirloom to pay for her children's tuition.
articles.content:
Dear Jane,
A few years ago, my mother died. She lived a wonderfully full life and my siblings and I were incredibly close to her. As well as being a fantastic mother, she was also an incredible gran… [+6546 chars]
